translations: n.大折叠刀；屈体跳水；（统计）折刀法
v.屈身，弓腰；（铰接车失控时）弯折成 V 形；用大折叠刀切；作屈体跳水

sentences.sentence: But, yahoo still is put in jackknife government issue.
sentences.translation: 但是，雅虎仍存在重叠管理问题。

sentences.sentence: Arch spat some more tobacco juice on his boot top and whetted the jackknife blade some more.
sentences.translation: 阿奇又朝靴面上吐了些烟沫，再把大折刀磨了几下。

sentences.sentence: T he algorithm has been trained and tested on Bacillus subtilis promoter dataset by the jackknife method.
sentences.translation: 对实际数据集进行的刀切法测试验证了算法的有效性。
